search_general_talk_easter_2021/4402_070: Please don’t say that! Let me have it!
Well...sorry, but I’d like this one for myself...
Hm? Are they fighting over an egg?

They found a really cool rock, and now they’re
arguing about who gets to keep it!

If only they’d get that passionate about
finding eggs...

Why don’t we leave it here so everyone can come
and admire it? That way, no hard feelings.
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4403_070:
I just found somethin’ really outta this world!
It was an egg with hands and feet!

It was walking around over there. Never seen
anything like it before. So weird!
Togepi? That some new kinda egg or somethin’?
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4405_070:
Man, searching for that missing Egg and Togepi at
the same time sure is exhausting!
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4406_070:
This boulder is in the way, so I can’t get to
that egg...
This calls for help from a friend!
If you need a rock smashed, leave it to me!
I lost my chance to shine...

All right! Let’s go and smash through that rock
over there!
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4407_070:
I just can’t find any eggs! That kid I saw earlier
was doing a real good job, though. What’s up
with that?
It’s not even fair! Why are my chances so rotten?!
Wait, I said “chances!” Not you, Chansey!
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4408_070:
Y’see, we found ourselves an egg here lookin’ all
nice for the takin’...

But that kid—y’know, the Hoenn boy—he just
swooped in all of a sudden!

We were so close to grabbing that egg, but he
came in like a flash and snatched it up!
His focus on finding eggs was almost obsessive!
A boy from Hoenn? I wonder who that was.

We left ourselves too open... He really got the
better of us...
search_general_talk_easter_2021/4409_070: Right? My other partner is super cute, too!

Whoa! Togepi! So you’ve been with this boy all
this time!
Aw, shucks. So this Togepi is yours?

When I teamed up with him, I got really lucky
and found a bunch of eggs!

Thanks for the help, Togepi! Let’s hang out
again sometime!

I guess it’s true that Togepi is able to grant
happiness to those around him.

Yes, he shared a lot of his happiness with that
boy...the same way he shares it with me.
What do you mean by that?

He’s opened up the doors to a lot of happiness for
me, too!

For instance, the joy of meeting you!
Right, Togepi?

Great! Now that we’ve found Togepi, we can
focus on finding that lost Pokémon Egg!
